poem:
Title: Unveiling the Song of Power

A hummingbird's promise,
Unfurls, once painted
by Biden's sunlit word:
"Force, the last call."
Yet, now wings echo again
with the shadow of war.
Our vexed interests, perchance?
Or is the symphony of power,
looming, a siren tune
drawing us back
to the dance?
So do we spiral,
never truly free,
Caught in the merciless gyre
of history.
